content: description this boxy style tee is the perfect summer top it s worked from side to side and has a fun stripe design it works up quickly by using the double_crochet stitch throughout and features a delicate picot edging the saltwater taffy tee includes sizes xs-5x this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit through lionbrand com 2 it includes the pdf digital download + all the yarn needed to make the top you can customize your color options 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/saltwater-taffy-tee-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/2fbsg
